column5: Hey folks I will be heading off to Bay of Quinte for 4 days May 16th I need to pick up a licence for my Dad who is 69 but must purchase a licence because he is from out of province.  Can I pick up a licence at CDN tire I expect to arrive in Napanee around 8am. Is there another place I could go to pick up my Dad's licence.  Mike the Pike
They sure would Mike... at the courtesy desk now when you enter the stores. Might not open 'till 8:30 though..
CTC Napanee opens at 8AM all mornings except Sunday when they open at 9.
Crappy Tire in Napanee does not sell the licenses; they are available at Walmart, which is just a minute down the road.
I dont think any crappy tire's sell them anymore......  I know in belleville they dont.
phoning canadian tire directly never crossed your mind?  Is it your smithwick rouge i still have?
I bought mine at CTC Trenton.
